docs.text: Resource for all your IT certifications This website is a living document to help you pass your next certification. To use this website look in the drop down menu to find the certifications you are looking for. We are trying to keep this website as updated as possible, so if we are missing anything that has helped you passed any test, please let us know.

docs.text: A+ ¶ Overview ¶ Exam Code: 220-1001 and 220-1002. Need to pass both exams to earn A+ Prerequisites: None Recommended Experience: None Number of Questions: 90 Test Format: Multiple choice questions (single and multiple response), drag and drops and performance-based Length of Test: 90 minutes Passing Score: 220-1001: 675 (on a scale of 100-900) 220-1002: 700 (on a scale of 100-900) Test Objectives: 220-1001 Objectives and 220-1002 Objectives Cost: $219 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired. Renewal: You can either take a higher certification, pass the most current version of the exam, get 20 or more credits of Continuing Education Units in 3 years, or complete CertMaster CE, an online, self-paced CE course. docs.text: Exam Code: CISSP Prerequisites: Minimum of five years cumulative paid work experience in two or more of the eight domains or 4 years with a degree Recommended Experience: 4 to 5 years of IT experience Number of Questions: 100-150 Test Format: Multiple choice CAT format Length of Test: 3 Hours Passing Score: 700/1000 Test Objectives: CISSP Objectives Cost: $699 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired. Renewal: Continuing Professional Education (CPE) credits annual fees

docs.text: Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional(CSSLP) ¶ Overview ¶ Exam Code: CSSLP Prerequisites: 4 years of cumulative paid Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) professional work experience in one or more of the eight domains of the (ISC)² CSSLP CBK, or 3 years of cumulative paid SDLC professional work experience in one or more of the eight domains of the CSSLP CBK with a four-year degree, Recommended Experience: 4 years of IT experience Number of Questions: 175 Test Format: Multiple choice Length of Test: 4 Hours Passing Score: 700/1000 Test Objectives: CSSLP Objectives Cost: $599 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired.
